Giving Towers a "tractor beam" ability always appealed to me.  



--- In gladiator@yahoogroups.com, Tom Tildrum <tevildoii@y...> wrote:
> I've always thought that towers should have a "boiling
> oil" special attack, that damages units adjacent to
> the tower. It would make tower-defended doorways more
> perilous.

Admittedly, trying to get between the tower-defended doorways in my 
"Release of Sun Bai" is dangerous; one could argue that's because of 
the experience level.

> I also think that towers should perhaps be
 more resilient to missile attacks, so that people need
 to get close in order to destroy them. 

Every character should have a weakness.

>Towers, as they are, are weak against mages and archers.

or elves on the other side of a forest.
